title: FS: Low Grade T-205 Lot of Five [SOLD]
author: jmanners51

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T-205 Lot of Five [SOLD]
posts.post_content:
Available for sale are five T-205 cards in low grade condition.  I am selling these five as a lot for a cost of [SOLD].  The cards are as follows:

Doc White
William Bailey
Daniel Hoffman
John Nee (Minor Leaguer)
George Merritt (Minor Leaguer)

If you want to purchase this lot:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the lot. This post will secure the lot in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding the lot.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the lot in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
